title: Best of The Program | Guest: Karl Manke | 5/11/20
description:
The experts on Glenn’s latest BlazeTV exclusive show confirmed that for the first time, we have proof of UFOs and beyond-next-generation technology. But are these vehicles hostile? It’s more important than ever to do our own homework as the government and media become one to put out their own version of truth. Michigan barber shop owner Karl Manke joins to describe why he opened his shop, even after he was warned not to. There’s a modern-day common sense coming out of the pandemic.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
